
{{actions:
- display: Start
  input:
  - reason
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/machine/start
  hideon:
  - RUNNING
  hideonInput: ${status}
  data:
   machineId: $$id
   accountName: ${accountName}
   spaceName: ${spacename}

- display: Stop
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/machine/stop
  hideon:
  - HALTED
  hideonInput: ${status}
  data:
   machineId: $$id
   accountName: ${accountName}
   spaceName: ${spacename}
  input:
  - reason

- display: Stop For Abusive Resource Usage
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/machine/stopForAbusiveResourceUsage
  data:
   machineId: $$id
   accountName: ${accountName}
  input:
  - reason

- display: Reboot
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/machine/reboot
  data:
   machineId: $$id
   accountName: ${accountName}
   spaceName: ${spacename}
  input:
  - reason

- display: Pause
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/machine/pause
  hideon:
  - HALTED
  hideonInput: ${status}
  data:
   machineId: $$id
   accountName: ${accountName}
   spaceName: ${spacename}
  input:
  - reason

- display: Resume
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/machine/resume
  data:
   machineId: $$id
   accountName: ${accountName}
   spaceName: ${spacename}
  input:
  - reason

- display: Delete
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/machine/destroy
  data:
   machineId: $$id
   accountName: ${accountName}
   spaceName: ${spacename}
  input:
  - reason

- display: Snapshot
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/machine/snapshot
  data:
   machineId: $$id
   accountName: ${accountName}
   spaceName: ${spacename}
  input:
  - reason
  - snapshotName

- display: Rollback Snapshot
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/machine/rollbackSnapshot
  data:
   machineId: $$id
   accountName: ${accountName}
   spaceName: ${spacename}
  input:
  - reason
  - snapshotName

- display: Delete Snapshot
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/machine/deleteSnapshot
  data:
   machineId: $$id
   accountName: ${accountName}
   spaceName: ${spacename}
  input:
  - reason
  - snapshotName

- display: Clone
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/machine/clone
  data:
   machineId: $$id
   accountName: ${accountName}
   spaceName: ${spacename}
  input:
  - reason
  - cloneName

- display: Backup And Destroy
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/machine/backupAndDestroy
  data:
   accountName: ${accountName}
   machineId: $$id
  input:
  - reason

- display: Create Portforwarding
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/machine/createPortForward
  data:
   machineId: $$id
   spaceName: ${spacename}
  input:
  - localPort
  - destPort
  - name: proto
    type: dropdown
    label: Protocol
    values:
     - label: TCP
       value: tcp
     - label: UDP
       value: udp
  - reason

- display: Delete Portforwarding
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/machine/deletePortForward
  data:
   machineId: $$id
   spaceName: ${spacename}
  input:
  - ruleId
  - reason

- display: Create Template
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/machine/createTemplate
  data:
   machineId: $$id
   spaceName: ${spacename}
  input:
  - templateName
  - reason

- display: Update Machine
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/machine/updateMachine
  data:
   machineId: $$id
   spaceName: ${spacename}
  input:
  - description
  - reason

# - display: Export

- display: Check Image Chain
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/machine/checkImageChain
  data:
   machineId: $$id

- display: Move to a different Stack
  action: "#movemachine"

- display: Tag
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/machine/tag
  data:
   machineId: $$id
  input:
  - tagName

- display: Remove Tag
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/machine/untag
  data:
   machineId: $$id
  input:
  - tagName

}}

{{movemachine: machineId:$$id accountName:${accountName}}}
